text: Verner Bonde (8 May 1887 - 28 June 1976) was a Danish fencer. He competed in the individual foil and team sabre events at the 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1887 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Danish male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Denmark Category:Fencers at the 1920 Summer Olympics
title: Verner Bonde
